title: fireRiskR
text: R package interactively explore published Fire Weather Index (FWI) probability ratios (PR) Australian bushfire risk. Website (pkgdown): https://etc5523-2025.github.io/assignment-4-packages--shiny-apps-Dhruvinn13/

title: fireRiskR
text: Packaged dataset: fwi_pr (short, documented summary table) Shiny app inst/app/app.R (scenario selector + PR bar chart + values table) CSV download filtered table inside app roxygen2 docs, vignette, pkgdown site Note: Values summarised/derived van Oldenborgh et al. (2021).

title: fireRiskR
code: library(fireRiskR)  # Which scenarios are available? unique(fwi_pr$scenario)  # Simple summary by source (ignores NAs) aggregate(pr_best ~ source, data = fwi_pr, FUN = function(x) mean(x, na.rm = TRUE))  # Open the app launch_app()
